climatePledgeFriendly.details: ISCC PLUS certified products are created using raw materials like recycled plastics and bio-based materials, which can reduce fossil fuel consumption.

features: 🎤PERFECT FOR PARTIES: The karaoke machine is portable and designed for fun, making it the perfect addition to any party or gathering. It can be easily transported to different locations and its sleek design makes it a great centerpiece for any event.

🎤SUPERIOR SUBWOOFER WITH BLUETOOTH 5.0: With a superior subwoofer and Bluetooth 5.0 connectivity, this karaoke machine delivers high-quality sound that will impress even the most discerning audiophiles. Whether you're singing karaoke or just playing music, the sound quality is sure to enhance your experience.

🎤RECHARGEABLE AND LONG-LASTING: Comes with a rechargeable battery that provides up to 8 hours of play time. You won't have to worry about running out of power in the middle of your party, as this machine can keep the music going all night long.

🎤VERSATILE AND EASY TO USE: The karaoke speaker is versatile and easy to use, making it a great option for people of all ages. Whether you're a seasoned karaoke pro or just starting out, this machine is simple to operate and comes with everything you need to get started. Additionally, its Bluetooth connectivity makes it easy to stream music from your phone or other devices.

🎤DISCO LIGHTS & INFRARED SENSOR REMOTE CONTROL: LED Disco Lights can jump with the rhythm of the music and can switch a variety of lighting effects to give you a perfect ambient experience. Infrared sensor remote control allows you to easily switch songs and play modes, distance is no longer a problem.

🎤THE BEST GIFT FOR ALL: HWWR speaker is a wonderful gift for people of all ages, whether they love music, partying, or just want to enjoy high-quality audio at home. It's a versatile and practical gift that anyone will love, It's great for birthday gifts, Christmas gifts, and holiday gifts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect & so worth it
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This karaoke machine is lightweight but sturdy and gets LOUD! The sound quality of both the master audio and the mic audio is great and i love how you can adjust those volume levels separately. A night with my friends is not complete without busting this out. The bluetooth is super easy to connect which is a huge bonus, as i feel like a lot of tech from amazon has very finicky bluetooth. The wireless mic connects immediately and is awesome for duets so nobody has to take turns. Got a good deal on it too. If youre deciding whether or not to buy it, let this be your sign. So much fun.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Serious karaoke machine
reviews.reviewText: There are a lot of karaoke machines out there that seemed toy-like. This one is definitely not. The quality is excellent. The sound/microphones are clear and loud. The Bluetooth connectivity is quick and automatic. The speaker is light but also heavy enough that it feels sturdy. The charge holds for a long time. We have had it for a month and only charged it when we first got it. Totally worth every penny. You really can't find a karaoke machine this nice anywhere near this price point.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect gift and Ease of use
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This was a perfect Christmas gift for our 8 year old singing daughter. She loves to sing and perform and this machine connects to phones, smart tvs and pretty much any other device with ease. The sound is excellent and the microphones work superbly. Love the fact there is a blue tooth microphone which allows for a lot of freedom. The best gift our daughter got this holiday!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome little piece of entertainment!!
reviews.reviewText: I’m a middle school teacher and wanted to use this for my classroom. Instead of a holiday movie at Christmas time or standard class party with snacks, I decided to do a Christmas karaoke party. I have to tell this machine helped me pull this off and it was such a hit, other teachers and students asked to borrow it!!The best thing about this little machine is it’s portable but don’t let the size fool you!! The sound quality is amazing!! The bass and treble were adjustable from my mac book for better sounding instruments in Christmas music.The mic is adjustable and large enough to capture your voice to the song you sing.Bottom line: this is one of the best value karaoke machines I’ve seen. I nearly spent twice as much on a slightly bigger machine but with two mics and quality sound I’m glad I went with this one. Here’s to a new year and lots of fun coming up for the holidays to come!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for family nights/parties
reviews.reviewText: My family and I love this karaoke machine. Easy to use & portable. Sounds great. It’s a must have at parties!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I like it but..
reviews.reviewText: This is a portable/rechargeable speaker. Lightweight and very cute in person..I like it but there's no proper instruction on how to use/charge. I just have to use my common sense on this product. It has a record button which is brilliant I think.The microphones are lightweight and seem to be well made. It produces a clear excellent voice output.One mic is corded and the other wireless. The wireless mic controll is located on the left knob of the machine itself, which also control the volume of the sound/music being played.The machine's volume is loud enough for 2300sqft space.Overall happy with this purchase and would recommend it. Price is also very competitive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My son loved it and so does the rest of the Family!
reviews.reviewText: This was a surprise Christmas gift for my 11 year old boy. He loves it! Great quality, great sound, not overly huge which we love! He loves being able to put the strap on it and walk around with it. We all have made great memories with some great sounding tunes! Ordered and received quickly with no damage! Thank you!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I liked how easy it was to set up and use. It's recommended to charge after each use however we've used it many times and have yet to charge it, so it keeps a good charge. It's inconvenient though to have to buy your own charging brick and batteries to get you started. This is a very good quality karaoke machine and hours of entertainment. I reccomend this machine as it's priced descently, great quality, and so easy to use.
